changes.0: Paperwork Generators - Copying and pasting generated reports will no longer have any issues with the day/night modes across websites. Generated reports will now display a 'Code' text box as part of the 2nd and final update for the Copy and Paste fix on Chrome. Please copy and paste from the code box. The live MDC will now detect it as HTML code and paste it into the code editor. (Massive thank you to St3fan[NL])

changes.3: Parking Ticket Generator - Vehicle plates will now automatically change to uppercase upon the generated report.
changes.4: Traffic Division: Patrol Report Generator - Increased limit from 30 to 100 after hitting over 30 traffic stops in one patrol. (Credit: myself)
changes.5: Arrest Report Generator - The dashboard camera section is now required. No matter the plea of the suspect.

changes.0: Traffic Report Generator - Fixed the vehicle registered owner field being required, if left empty, will use the Defendant's name. (Thanks to Spartan for finding the bug)

changes.2: Parking Ticket Generator - Fixed the add photograph button not adding a new photograph slot. (Thanks to Goddessoflife for finding the bug)

changes.0: Site - All required input fields are now highlighted as red if empty, green if filled, any fields without borders are optional/if applicable.
changes.1: Site - Fixed links text on buttons being the incorrect colour on light mode.
changes.2: Paperwork Generators - Most front-end jQuery code for all paperwork generators was re-written for clarity sake.
changes.3: Paperwork Generators - Added tooltip functionalities on all dynamic slots which support tooltips.
changes.4: Paperwork Generators - Updated generator titles to exclude ' - Form' from their titles, deeming them as redundant.
changes.5: Arrest Charges Calculator - Charge selector now auto selects charge class, charge offence, and charge addition.
changes.6: Traffic Division: Patrol Report Generator - Icon changed to the Traffic Division logo.
changes.7: Traffic Division: Patrol Report Generator - Updated the report template to the latest changes regarding marked/unmarked vehicles. (Courtesy of Donally's request)
changes.8: Traffic Report Generator - New Registration & Insurance logic added. (Courtesy of Goddessoflife's suggestion)
changes.9: Traffic Report Generator - Charge selector now auto selects charge class.
changes.10: Parking Ticket Generator - Updated vehicle details section to match the update regarding the Traffic Report Generator.
changes.11: Impound Report Generator - Updated vehicle details section to match the update regarding the Traffic Report Generator.
changes.12: Impound Report Generator - Fixed a bug where the duration of impound field would automatically default to your badge number.
changes.13: Patrol Log Generator - Traffic Events are now only required if a traffic report was written, removing the unnecessary duplication of information and directly pointing to the traffic report ID.
changes.14: Patrol Log Generator - Fixed a bug where the partner rank was a required field.

changes.0: Site - Dark mode is now the default option, if cookies are cleared or never set. (Credit: Coakley, for forcing me to make this change)
changes.1: Paperwork Generators - Front End Code Complete Rework, All generators have been updated to be using the new code.
changes.2: Site - Small Backend code fixes.
changes.3: Sidebar - The clock now displays a leading '0' for the hours. After: 01:00, before: 1:00

changes.0: Arrest Charges Calculator - Extensive backend code rework and update, the code is much more versatile and dynamic for limitless input variations.
changes.1: Arrest Charges Calculator - Sentencing Enhancements input are now applicable to charges to promote its usage, reducing both the sentence times and arrest points. (Reductions: Offender 0%, Accomplice 0%, Accessory 50%, Conspiracy 75%)
changes.2: Arrest Charges Calculator - Arrest Charges now dynamically display which offences (1st, 2nd, 3rd) may be applied to the selected crime.
changes.3: Arrest Charges Calculator - Crime time calculation rework, now works with the most optimal time-based units splitting. (If time totals are 60 minutes or above, change to hours and minutes instead, if 24 hours or above, change to days and hours, etc)
changes.4: Paperwork Generators - Small rank chooser optimisations and code fixes.
changes.5: Paperwork Generators - More backend code updates and optimisations.
changes.6: Site - Site-wide visual updates and element fixes.
changes.7: Site - Backend files reshuffled to appropriate locations, split actual page structure and functional code into separate files. (No more procedural coding.)
changes.8: Street Guide - Added missing station 'Rockford Hills Community Police Station'.
changes.9: Street Guide - Fixed the spelling of the Twin Towers building. (Credit: Tseard)

changes.0: Site - Swapped all CDN hosted resources to local for better performance.
changes.1: Impound Report Generator - Fixed inaccessible generator. (Credit: Chris Farmer / Disretired)
changes.2: Charges Table - Fixed the table header 'Classification' to be 'Type' instead.
changes.3: Charges Table - Fixed table headers to be centered with their respective centered table detail fields.
changes.4: Changelog - Fixed style to be showing the correct style for the page background.

changes.1: GitHub - Removed inactive contributors.

changes.9: Site - Improved URL routing system with the removal of duplicate code.
changes.10: Site - San Andreas Penal Code link updated... again.
changes.11: Site - Further backend code reworks and improvements for better stability, security, code-readability, and performance.

changes.15: Sidebar - Removed unused links and relocated most to Useful Resources.

changes.18: Paperwork Generators - Now updated to work with the latest Penal Code update (02/JAN/2020, New Point System, Classification + Types swap, Charge Updates)

changes.20: Paperwork Generators - Updated charges .402 & .412 to automatically detect upgrades from Misdemeanour to Felony types of crimes based on user input.
